channel.title: Need some help [Delta]
channel.description:
I am working on barrows and I want that clickon on that chest and than this will pop up.
[IMG]http://statimagecreator.co.cc/upload/images/4.png[/img]
and after clicking on it, it will come that choice "Yeah I'm fearless" "No way, that looks scary!"
Could anyone post a code? Please :)
Thanks ~Alan

item.title: Need some help [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @awa006 awa006
item.description:
@awa006 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:2, topic:403637”]This has to do with Dialogue. We need some more information, what ID that NPCDialogue is, and what happens after you click on each of those buttons.[/quote] okay, thanks I’ll see what I can do.

Read full topic
